page.title: 19PETS,ANNAN
page.content: Most pets are bought in the pet shop and can be expensive to buy.We came to the conclusion that a dog is the most popular pet Pet dogs are usually tame but sometimes they are not properly trained and become wild. Some parents look after their pets on their own,but children sometimes help. Most pets are well looked after because we found that very few had injuries or illnesses.Those which did have illnesses were taken to the vet. Some even go to the bother of travelling to other towns to get treatment for their pets.Unfortunately there are some owners who never take their pets to the vet.
